## PopulatableMoneyp.repayBPD() method

Adjust existing Vault by repaying some of its debt.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
repayBPD(amount: Decimalish): Promise<PopulatedMoneypTransaction<P, SentMoneypTransaction<S, MoneypReceipt<R, VaultAdjustmentDetails>>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | The amount of BPD to repay. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PopulatedMoneypTransaction](./lib-base.populatedmoneyptransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;P, [SentMoneypTransaction](./lib-base.sentmoneyptransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [MoneypReceipt](./lib-base.moneypreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, [VaultAdjustmentDetails](./lib-base.vaultadjustmentdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Equivalent to:

```typescript
adjustVault({ repayBPD: amount })

```
